components.component:
org.richfaces.DndParam org.richfaces.DndParam org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlDndParam org.richfaces.component.UIDndParam
org.richfaces.component.html.HtmlDndParamComponentTest org.ajax4jsf.tests.AbstractAjax4JsfTestCase
A component is used for parameters transmission in Drag and Drop operations. It's also used for dragIndicator elements definition with transmitting some values for rendering in it.
dndParam org.richfaces.taglib.DndParamTag
org.ajax4jsf.webapp.taglib.HtmlComponentTagBase
&ui_component_attributes;
name java.lang.String A name of this parameter
type java.lang.String This attribute defines parameter functionality. Possible values are "drag", "drop" and "default". Default value is "default".
"default"
value java.lang.Object
The current value for this component
